basics.name: Dr Emily Ngamau
basics.label:
My Objective; To use my professional skills to promote and improve accessibility to approved standards of safe, efficacious and quality drugs essential to optimal health outcomes for human welfare thereby sustain economic and social development

I am a Registered Pharmacist with the Pharmacy and Poisons Board, Kenya and a member of the Pharmaceutical Society of Kenya (PSK), with experience in industrial pharmacy as a company pharmacist ie in the role of regulatory and compliance pharmacist and also providing pharmaceutical services in a retail, clinical and hospital setting. I have a lot of experience in regulatory work i.e. exports& imports, generic and brand drug dossier submissions, variations, food supplements and borderline products and medical devices submissions and approvals. 
I have a proven ability of establishing positive relationships with the regulatory authorities, customers, pharmaceutical manufacturers, medical professionals and pharmaceutical/ medical representatives and dedicated to providing quality products for patient care

Email address; dremilyngamau@gmail.com

work.company: Tata Africa Holdings (Kenya) Ltd, Mombasa rd, Nairobi
work.desc: Overall responsibility for company policies and procedures set at Pharmacy Board level and compliance with legal and ethical obligations and professional duties.

work.company: Ministry of medical services, Kenyatta National Hospital & Vihiga District Hospital

education.studyType: Masters of Health Economics and Policy

education.institution: Kilimanjaro School of Pharmacy with Purdue university and Howard University
education.studyType: Postgraduate diploma, Industrial Pharmacy, Advanced Training Program in Drug Development, Drug Manufacturing, Regulatory & Quality Compliance.
